ygData.subject: Re: Questions about lvl 18 song
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Any idea if this is also the case with Binding (L20)?  None of my friends are willing to duel me to find out... -- John H. Kim kim@stormhaven.org
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 18 Jun 1999, Keith G. Spencer wrote:
>
> >I was wondering, if the MOB get hit by this song then I stop
> >playing does their ac still down and still do dmg to them for another 2
> >melee or does it stop when u stop. Any info on this would be appreciated.
>
> Just like chords & hymn, discord's effect lasts for 3 rounds, so juggle
> in two more songs :)

Any idea if this is also the case with Binding (L20)? None of
my friends are willing to duel me to find out...

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
